e7211a2e-341f-43e5-8917-1e3e51b3620e.description: Esta insignia se obtiene al demostrar competencia básica para autogestión y habilidades relacionadas. Evalúan sus habilidades de autogestión a través de escenarios y actividades aplicadas; examinan las habilidades de planificación, incluyendo el establecimiento de objetivos y la gestión del tiempo, la organización y el monitoreo del progreso, la persistencia, el autocontrol y la atención a los detalles. También demuestran conocimiento de estrategias para desarrollar la autogestión.
e7211a2e-341f-43e5-8917-1e3e51b3620e.name: Autogestión

badge_template_activities.title: Completar la evaluación y lograr un puntaje de dominio del 80% o mejor.

be238e59-20bf-4541-8785-0e232fc415c5.description: Se obtiene esta insignia al demostrar competencia básica en áreas clave, como saber escuchar; comprender y desarrollar grupos y equipos; formar y participar en equipos; trabajar en colaboración para establecer objetivos comunes, promover una comunicación abierta, generar resultados sólidos y manejar conflictos comunes de un equipo.
be238e59-20bf-4541-8785-0e232fc415c5.name: Trabajo en equipo y colaboración

badge_template_activities.title: Completar la evaluación y lograr un puntaje de dominio del 80 % o mejor

5db16515-5e78-4f7f-b614-6b3bba3680e2.description: Se obtiene esta insignia al demostrar conocimiento básico y competencia en la comunicación interpersonal, oral y escrita en el lugar de trabajo. El usuario puede analizar cómo ajustar el mensaje, el tono y el medio para una audiencia determinada; aplicar habilidades interpersonales, como escuchar y manejar conflictos; y aplicar habilidades de comunicación no verbales, verbales y escritas en el ámbito laboral, utilizadas en diferentes contextos.
5db16515-5e78-4f7f-b614-6b3bba3680e2.name: Comunicación

badge_template_activities.title: Completar la evaluación y lograr un puntaje de dominio del 80 % o mejor.

82224ffa-bbc0-42f1-91f5-e92ebf7a58e1.description: Esta insignia se obtiene demostrando una competencia básica de habilidades de liderazgo mediante la identificación de estilos y el análisis de situaciones en ambientes académicos y laborales.
82224ffa-bbc0-42f1-91f5-e92ebf7a58e1.name: Liderazgo

badge_template_activities.title: Completar la evaluación y lograr un puntaje de dominio del 80 % o mejor.

26dfd7a4-c9ec-4580-8854-1de22ec9a86c.description: Se obtiene esta insignia al demostrar competencia básica en la identificación y evaluación de aseveraciones y evidencias, separando los hechos de la opinión, identificando incógnitas, reconociendo sesgos, identificando problemas, generando y evaluando posibles soluciones, observando y considerando diferentes perspectivas con una mente abierta.
26dfd7a4-c9ec-4580-8854-1de22ec9a86c.name: Pensamiento Crítico

fac47c25-a210-40d2-918c-06ca0133d160.description: Se obtiene esta insignia al demostrar una comprensión básica de la cultura y de otras diferencias que afectan las interacciones en la escuela y en el trabajo, la civilidad, los problemas éticos clave en los entornos educativos y laborales y el reconocimiento de cómo las acciones personales pueden afectar a los demás.
fac47c25-a210-40d2-918c-06ca0133d160.name: Responsabilidad Social

ec56a580-fb36-480a-b1b8-2a2ed3f607dd.description: Este distintivo é obtido através da demonstração de competência básica em domínios fundamentais como escuta; compreensão e desenvolvimento de grupos e equipes; formação e participação em equipes; trabalho colaborativo para estabelecer objetivos comuns; promoção da comunicação aberta; geração de resultados sólidos; e gerenciamento de conflitos comuns de equipes.

ab49cc76-be50-4480-8f1e-118b721287c8.description: Este distintivo é obtido através da demonstração de competência básica em autogestão e habilidades relacionadas. O usuário demonstra habilidades de autogestão em uma gama de ambientes, atividades e planejamento, incluindo o estabelecimento de metas e gerenciamento de tempo, organização e monitoramento do progresso, persistência, autocontrole e atenção aos detalhes.

488e3a39-fc4c-498b-bc4a-a8e032cefd3d.description: Earners of the Pearson Online Leaning Services Invest in You Marketing Practitioner have achieved the POLS Invest in You Marketing skills and certification. Earners can create and manage social media campaigns and understand the customer life cycle and direct-to-consumer models. Earners have acquired skills and knowledge obtained through advanced coursework in the following Marketing areas: Digital Marketing strategies, online marketing, social media techniques, and marketing management.
488e3a39-fc4c-498b-bc4a-a8e032cefd3d.name: Marketing Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Marketing program courses through various Academic institutions. The coursework topics are marketing strategies, mobile marketing, customer lifetime value, and direct-to-consumer models.

Complete weekly assignments and reflections demonstrating an understanding of digital marketing principles. Additionally, learners must complete and submit all coursework assignments by the syllabus due date and receive a passing grade for each course.
Complete assigned weekly quizzes that reflected mastery of the marketing subject being assessed.

Complete projects based on digital marketing and social media campaigns. Additionally, through the corresponding project assignments, the earner demonstrates an understanding of the customer lifecycle.

fc1215e1-fae8-445b-9e8e-52a93c7e41fd.description: The earner of this credential has achieved the Pearson Online Learning Services Quality Assurance certification. Earners display mastery of quality assurance models and frameworks. They have acquired skills and knowledge obtained through advanced QA employee development programs in the following areas: quality assurance frameworks, call auditing sentiment analysis, employee coaching, and development.
fc1215e1-fae8-445b-9e8e-52a93c7e41fd.name: Quality Assurance Coordinator Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Quality Assurance employee development courses. The development module topics are the POLS quality assurance framework, call recording platform usage, employee coaching, and feedback models, and Quality Systems best practices.
Complete weekly assignments and reflections demonstrating the correct Quality Assurance call evaluation forms and gathering of call trends and the Voice of the Customer (VOC).
Complete assigned weekly calibration sessions reflected mastery of the empathetic call and coaching model.
Complete three QA calibration sessions with a passing score and full utilization of the POLS Quality Assurance model.

908b43fe-1073-4c66-9273-a57736d5daca.description: Este distintivo é obtido através da demonstração de uma compreensão básica da cultura e outras diferenças que afetam as interações diárias e no local de trabalho; civilidade; questões éticas fundamentais nos ambientes sociais e de trabalho; e reconhecimento de como as ações pessoais podem afetar os outros.
908b43fe-1073-4c66-9273-a57736d5daca.name: Responsabilidade Social

badge_template_activities.title: Avaliação de habilidades com 80% ou mais de pontuação.

1f4d4d9b-aed3-4478-9e5b-114da75d8621.description: El estudiante comprende el contexto en el cual se desarrolla el proceso educativo identificando la evolución de la educación y los retos de la formación de habilidades para la vida.
1f4d4d9b-aed3-4478-9e5b-114da75d8621.name: Conciencia del contexto

6a2809e0-66b2-4cd5-a6c6-1d87be40e12a.description: Earners of the Pearson Online Learning Services Invest in You Data Analytics have achieved the POLS Invest in You data and analytics certification. Earners can create and implement design thinking models and understand the user experience, testing, and feedback. Earners have acquired skills and knowledge obtained through advanced coursework in the following data and analytics areas: data and analytics, creating innovative business models, and machine learning and Big data applications.
6a2809e0-66b2-4cd5-a6c6-1d87be40e12a.name: Data & Analytics Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Data Analytics program at Academic institutions. The coursework topics are analytic data theory, business modeling, and machine learning.
Complete weekly assignments and reflections demonstrating an understanding of data analytics tools and how to utilize those tools to create business models from corporate to startup companies.
Complete assigned weekly quizzes that reflected mastery of the data analytics models and machine learning materials.
Complete projects based on financial modeling, machine learning applications, and financial risk for companies.

8db65020-90ca-4aea-b53c-63c2755ba490.description: El estudiante caracteriza las habilidades de empoderamiento, modelado de la personalidad, duelo, funcionalidad y control de impulsos, valorando su aplicación como vía al crecimiento personal.
8db65020-90ca-4aea-b53c-63c2755ba490.name: Habilidades de autorregulación

0cfef8b2-18f1-4a79-8d68-7a891b800663.description: El estudiante caracteriza las habilidades de trabajo en equipo, competitividad, y posicionamiento, determinando la pertinencia de cada una según la sintalidad del grupo al que pertenece.
0cfef8b2-18f1-4a79-8d68-7a891b800663.name: Habilidades directivas

123b2af3-3e4d-4d2b-9b36-8c1ce7f4fd39.description: El estudiante reflexiona sobre los casos simulados hipotetizando su actuar, así como definiendo las emociones percibidas al ejecutar los ejercicios presentados.
123b2af3-3e4d-4d2b-9b36-8c1ce7f4fd39.name: Habilidades para la vida

badge_template_activities.title: Aplicación de examen de reactivos de opción múltiple en plataforma autocalificable.

32244105-9ca1-497c-98a8-c4430fe5d855.description: El estudiante caracteriza las habilidades de aprendizaje, comunicación, conocimiento multicultural, intersubjetividad y la inteligencia emocional, infiriendo su utilidad y aplicación en las relaciones interpersonales.
32244105-9ca1-497c-98a8-c4430fe5d855.name: Habilidades socioafectivas

4cfb3351-e546-465b-94c3-861fe2e8b462.description: Earners of the Pearson Online Learning Services Invest in You Innovation Practitioner have achieved the POLS Invest in You design thinking skills and certification. Earners can create and implement design thinking models and understand the user experience, testing, and feedback. Earners have acquired skills and knowledge obtained through advanced coursework in the following Innovation areas: design thinking fundamentals, user testing, and prototyping.
4cfb3351-e546-465b-94c3-861fe2e8b462.name: Innovation & Strategy Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Innovation program courses through various Academic institutions. The coursework topics are design thinking theory, problem-solving, user testing, and prototyping.
Complete weekly assignments and reflections demonstrating an understanding of user experience and reflecting on the user feedback to create new products or to iterate.
Complete assigned weekly quizzes that reflected mastery of the empathetic design thinking model.
Complete projects based on user testing, prototyping, continuous improvement, and iteration, where applicable.

96ca148f-c5ae-4b1a-aa1a-f40f01a4f1af.description: Earners of the Pearson Online Learning Services Invest in You Project Management badge have achieved the POLS Invest in You project management certification. Earners can create and utilize project management models, understand the PMO governance structure plus uses skills and knowledge obtained through advanced coursework in the following project management topics: agile project management, stakeholder and project control, and risk management.
96ca148f-c5ae-4b1a-aa1a-f40f01a4f1af.name: Project Management Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Complete program at various Academic institutions. The coursework topics are agile leadership and project management, the PMO and governance models, project management lifecycle, and risk assessment.
Complete weekly assignments and reflections demonstrates an understanding of project management tools and theories.
Complete assigned weekly quizzes that reflected mastery of the project management lifecycle and risk control per project model.
Complete projects based on the PMP governance model with stakeholder risk and agile leadership needs.
